versionControlService.title: Version Control Service
versionControlService.description: Select adapter to use to commit pre-built to version control service

makeProjectPrivateGithubOnly.title: Make Project Private (Github Only)
makeProjectPrivateGithubOnly.description: Check the box if the repository is to be made private

groupPath.title: Group Path
groupPath.description: Link to the group or workspace to create the project under. Use Organization Name if this is a GitHub project.

addRepositoryDependencyFiles.title: Add Repository Dependency Files
addRepositoryDependencyFiles.description: If checked, will add repository dependency files in addition to IAP component files such as the package.json file, GitHub action files, and scripts used in GitHub action files.

reDiscoverPrebuilt.title: Re-Discover Prebuilt
reDiscoverPrebuilt.description: Check this box in case any IAP components such as workflows, transformations, command templates, etc. have been added or removed

prebuilt.title: Pre-Built
prebuilt.description: Pre-Built to commit to project in version control service

projectPath.title: Project Path
projectPath.description: Project to create repository under (only for Bitbucket Cloud). Use uppercase key, ex. AT for Atlassian

mrType.title: Merge Request Type
mrType.description: Type of merge request (patch/minor/major). Typical use is patch for bug fix, minor for new feature, and major for breaking change to pre-built

commitMessage.title: Commit Message
commitMessage.description: A message to associate with the commit that describes change made

targetBranch.title: Target Branch
targetBranch.description: Enter target branch for Merge Request. If commit is for new branch, the new branch name is what is provided here.
